links.title: Google Sheets to API
links.description: Developing a Postman Collection that pulls data from a Google Sheet and then makes it available as an API, allowing the data to be seamlessly integrated into other websites and applications

links.title: Website scraping to API
links.description: Developing a Postman Collection that scrapes data from an existing website and then makes it available as an API for integration into other websites and applications

links.title: AWS Database to API
links.description: Deploying APIs from Aurora, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server databases using Postman.
